grading_explanation.practical_foundation: 2.6/3 – 22 of 35 fields filled (63% completion). Higher completion indicates better self-awareness and thoroughness.
grading_explanation.technical_competency: 1.8/2 – Strong technical skills with minor gaps that can be quickly filled (Python, machine learning, deep learning, prompt engineering; tools: Git, GitHub, Jupyter, VS Code, Excel, Aden)
grading_explanation.hands_on_experience: 2.5/3 – 1 solid internship + projects OR 2+ well-described projects with real-world applications (COTHON Solutions internship, AI Genesis and INNOTHON 2025 first place win, ConvAi, Project 11, Face and QR attendance)
grading_explanation.growth_potential: 1.5/2 – Some leadership experience OR strong career direction OR demonstrated learning initiative (University coding and AI clubs, tech fests, hackathons, social initiatives, building innovative projects, passion for AI and ML)

hiring_insights.strongest_assets: [1. Strong technical skills with minor gaps that can be quickly filled; 2. Solid practical experience including an internship and multiple projects]
hiring_insights.development_areas: [1. Increase self-awareness by completing more profile fields; 2. Develop specific, relevant, and up-to-date project implementations with clear roles and solutions]
hiring_insights.industry_readiness: [The candidate demonstrates good employability with strong technical skills and practical experience but may need to enhance their self-awareness and provide more detailed project descriptions to ensure readiness for professional work]

grading_debug.notes: [The candidate demonstrates a solid technical foundation and practical experience but may need to enhance their self-awareness by completing more profile fields and providing more detailed project descriptions]
